name: Oscar
bio: Nerd by day, Rockstar by night. Thinks he can sing, but probably better judged by the audience. If you have feedback, please keep it to yourself.

name: Chantal
bio: Guitar player who loves to play the drums and piano, and thinks she can sing - turned bass player (she also doesn't know how this happened exactly). Believes she'll ever compose a worldwide number 1 song.

name: Floris
bio: Self-taught drummer who learned everything in a studio and nothing from a book. Manages a data team for a living, which has misled the band into thinking I'm the band leaderâ€”I'm actually just here to hit things until the song ends.
